attributes.action: SQUATTERS SHOULD NOT HAVE RIGHTS OVER OWNERS
attributes.additional_details:
I watched a programme this evening.  A couple paid £900k for a property in London.  They currently stay in(and own) a flat whilst awaiting plans for renovation and meantime, professional squatters move in.

The couple are unable to to evict them without going to court.  As it is a civil matter, the Police cannot intervene.  The squatters leave the place in a disgusting state.

Eventually, the squatters are evicted, leaving the home owners with a £££k bill.
